languages.text: Напиток обжигает ваше горло и распускается раскаленным цветком в вашем желудке. В голове слегка мутится, а ноги подкашиваются.
The drink scalds your throat and blossoms into a molten flower once it reaches your stomach. Your vision blurs slightly, and your legs feel unsteady.
languages.original_text: Напиток обжигает ваше горло и распускается раскаленным цветком в вашем желудке. В голове слегка мутится, а ноги подкашиваются.

traits.locale_text: The drink scalds your throat and blossoms into a molten flower once it reaches your stomach. Your vision blurs slightly, and your legs feel unsteady.
The drink scalds your throat and blossoms into a molten flower once it reaches your stomach. Your vision blurs slightly, and your legs feel unsteady.
The drink scalds your throat and blossoms into a molten flower once it reaches your stomach. Your vision blurs slightly, and your legs feel unsteady.
The drink scalds your throat and blossoms into a molten flower once it reaches your stomach. Your vision blurs slightly, and your legs feel unsteady.
The drink scalds your throat and blossoms into a molten flower once it reaches your stomach. Your vision blurs slightly, and your legs feel unsteady.

languages.text: その飲み物はのどを焼き、胃に届いた途端に溶けた花のように感じられた。視界がわずかにぼやけ、足がふらつく。
languages.original_text: The drink scalds your throat and blossoms into a molten flower once it reaches your stomach. Your vision blurs slightly, and your legs feel unsteady.

traits.locale_text: その飲み物はのどを焼き、胃に届いた途端に溶けた花のように感じられた。視界がわずかにぼやけ、足がふらつく。

languages.text: La boisson vous brûle la gorge et s'épanouit comme une fleur ardente en atteignant votre estomac. Votre vision se trouble légèrement et vous vacillez un peu sur vos jambes.
languages.original_text: The drink scalds your throat and blossoms into a molten flower once it reaches your stomach. Your vision blurs slightly, and your legs feel unsteady.

traits.locale_text: La boisson vous brûle la gorge et s'épanouit comme une fleur ardente en atteignant votre estomac. Votre vision se trouble légèrement et vous vacillez un peu sur vos jambes.

languages.text: 烈酒灼伤了你的喉咙，流入胃中之后，仿佛变成了一朵烈焰烧成的铁花。你的视线变得有些模糊，腿也有点站不稳了。
languages.original_text: The drink scalds your throat and blossoms into a molten flower once it reaches your stomach. Your vision blurs slightly, and your legs feel unsteady.

traits.locale_text: 烈酒灼伤了你的喉咙，流入胃中之后，仿佛变成了一朵烈焰烧成的铁花。你的视线变得有些模糊，腿也有点站不稳了。

languages.text: Der Drink verbrennt deine Kehle und erblüht zu einer geschmolzenen Blume, sobald er deinen Magen erreicht. Deine Sicht wird leicht unscharf und dein Stand etwas unsicher.
languages.original_text: The drink scalds your throat and blossoms into a molten flower once it reaches your stomach. Your vision blurs slightly, and your legs feel unsteady.

traits.locale_text: Der Drink verbrennt deine Kehle und erblüht zu einer geschmolzenen Blume, sobald er deinen Magen erreicht. Deine Sicht wird leicht unscharf und dein Stand etwas unsicher.

languages.text: La bebida te escuece en su paso por tu garganta y llega a tu estómago como si se tratara de una explosión. La vista se te nubla ligeramente y te tiemblan las piernas.
languages.original_text: The drink scalds your throat and blossoms into a molten flower once it reaches your stomach. Your vision blurs slightly, and your legs feel unsteady.

traits.locale_text: La bebida te escuece en su paso por tu garganta y llega a tu estómago como si se tratara de una explosión. La vista se te nubla ligeramente y te tiemblan las piernas.
